name: Gacha Life OLD version 1.0.1 (Teja Gacha)
description: Hello guys Teja Gacha here!I have The OLD version of Gacha Life here!This is version 1.0.1 you have my channel in YouTube just type Teja Play's Gacha and there will be on my channel so much tutorials how to do something(Tutorials),how to get old version of Gacha Life back on phone,on computer(you have here),and more.The versions of Gacha Life are more popular so i decidet to make a Gacha Life OLD version project.This is NOT MY game this is Lunime game.I am really proud of it that you can using Gacha Life old version on PC so hope you liked the app and here is link to my channel:Teja Play's Gacha(My YT channel with tutorials and more)                                         Thank you and please subscribe on my YT channel bye!See ya in next of my or not my games!
